title: In search of the citizen in the datafication of public administration
research_description: This article explores how citizens are included and problematized in the discourse on public administration datafication in Norway, applying a multi-method approach with survey, interviews, and document analysis.
research_results: The study finds a lack of citizen participation in the process of datafication in Norway, highlighting a top-down technocratic approach where civil society and citizens are rarely engaged.
future_research: Future research should focus on developing participatory frameworks for including citizens in the datafication processes of public administration.
